summary: A playable version of the knife you see on the executioner's robes.
descriptionHtml:
So this modÂ changes the knife attached to the executioner's robes from being purely aesthetic, to actually being a useable weapon. It was actually harder to make than it sounds, as the weapon wasn't even a static object, it only existed as part of the robes' mesh. I used Blender and GIMP to make the knife. My third ever 3D modelling and texturing mod project.
The knife can be found in the Castle Dour Dungeons, and it can also be tempered.

Installation: Just install normally via NMM, or extract the esp to your data folder, and merge the meshes and textures folders with the ones in your data folder.

Compatibility: There shouldn't be any issues.

Hope you enjoy :)
author: simsim899
